trans-unit.source: Represents the margins for various chart elements.
trans-unit.target: 다양 한 차트 요소에 대해 여백을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> class with the specified top, bottom, left and right coordinates of the margin.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> 지정된 위쪽, 아래쪽, 왼쪽 및 오른쪽 여백 좌표를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 범례 셀에 사용 하는 경우 여백은 범례의 글꼴 크기의 백분율로 측정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Top margin.
Bottom margin.
Left margin.
Right margin.
Gets or sets the bottom margin.
When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 범례 셀에 사용 하는 경우 여백은 범례의 글꼴 크기의 백분율로 측정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 개체가 현재 개체와 같은지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to the current object, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>그렇지 않으면 지정된 된 개체는 현재 개체와 같으면 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 해시 코드를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the hash code for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> 에 대 한 해시 코드를 나타내는 값을 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the margins are empty.
trans-unit.target: 여백을 비어 있는지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if all margins values are zero, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>모든 여백 값이&0; 이면 그렇지 않은 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the left margin.
When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 범례 셀에 사용 하는 경우 여백은 범례의 글꼴 크기의 백분율로 측정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
The default value is 0.
Gets or sets the right margin.
When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 범례 셀에 사용 하는 경우 여백은 범례의 글꼴 크기의 백분율로 측정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
The default value is 0.
Gets or sets the top margin.
When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 범례 셀에 사용 하는 경우 여백은 범례의 글꼴 크기의 백분율로 측정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
The default value is 0.
Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object to a <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 변환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> 개체를 한 <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A [RectangleF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) object that has margins.
Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object to its <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representation.
trans-unit.target: 변환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"> </xref> 개체를 해당 <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> 표현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> 이 개체를 나타내는 값입니다.
